solution.GenerateArmTemplateFailNotice: '%s' Failed to create ARM template for required Azure services.
solution.UpdateArmTemplateFailNotice: '%s' Failed to update ARM template for required Azure services.
solution.UpdateArmTemplateNotice: The Azure resource template is updated based on your resource and capability selection. We recommend to initialize your project workspace with git init to track all changes.
solution.LocalDebugTenantConfirmNotice: You already run local debug for the Teams app in another tenant '%s'. You can sign out %s and sign in with the matched M365 account to re-use the previous local debug resource. If you really want to switch tenant for local debug, you can delete the %s file and re-run local debug.
solution.MigrationToArmAndMultiEnvMessage:
Teams Toolkit will upgrade your project configuration files to support the latest features. The upgrade process will not change your custom code and create the backup files in case revert is needed.
Notice this upgrade is a must-have to continue to use current version Teams Toolkit. If you are not ready to upgrade and want to continue to use the old version, please find Teams Toolkit in Extension and install the version <= 2.10.0
solution.MigrationToArmAndMultiEnvSuccessMessage: Upgrade succeeded. Your project is upgraded to new configuration files.
solution.MigrationToArmAndMultiEnvErrorMessage: Upgrade Failed. Please check the error message in Output window to troubleshoot and fix. You can also click Learn More for the FAQ and how to upgrade manually.
solution.MigrationToArmAndMultiEnvPreCheckErrorMe:
Upgrade Failed. '%s' doesn't exist or is not in json format. Please fix it and try again by running command (Teams: Upgrade project).
You can also click Learn More for the FAQ.
